goal.en: "1.Recognize the basic principles of economic analysis. 2.Improve students' comparative analysis of related cases such as capital borrowing and investment planning."
goal.ch: "1.認識經濟學分析的基本原理。 2.有助於同學對於資金借貸、投資規劃等相關案例做比較分析。"

content.en:
"Week Teaching theme
1 Course Introduction
2 Introduction and Cost Concepts and Design Economics
3 Money-Time Relationships and Equivalence
4 Applications of Money-Time Relationships
5 Comparing Alternatives
6 Depreciation and Income Taxes
7 Evaluating Projects with Benefit-Cost-Ratio Method
8 Midterm
9 Progress Presentation (3~5 minutes)
10 Cost Estimation Techniques
11 Price Changes and Exchange Rates
12 Project Progress Presentation
13 Dealing with Uncertainty and Replacement Analysis
14 Capital Financing and Allocation
15 Dealing with Multi-attributed Decisions
16 Final
17 Term Project Presentation_1 (10 minutes)
18 Term Project Presentation_2 (10 minutes)"
content.ch:
"週 教學主題
1 課程簡介
2 介紹和成本概念與設計經濟學
3 金錢時間關係和對等
4 金錢時間關係的應用
5 比較方案
6 折舊和所得稅
7 用效益成本比法評估項目
8 期中
9 進度報告（3?5分鐘）<摘要提交>
10 種成本估算技術
11 價格變動與匯率
12 專案進度介紹
13 處理不確定性和替換分析
14 資本融資與分配
15 處理多屬性決策
16 期末
17 學期專案簡報_1（10分鐘）
18 學期專案簡報_2（10分鐘）"
